argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: .T. if the file pointer is still valid. .F. if the file pointer is not valid.

page.discussion: The .IS_VALID() method tells you if the file pointer is valid. If you had opened a file across a network link and the network failed, you could get an invalid result.
page.example: dim fp as P fp = file.open("C:\Combobox.Txt", FILE_RO_EXCLUSIVE) ? fp.is_valid() = .T.
